column4: (catching up on the last few minutes of messages)  If you are going to be compiling/making/etc, apt-get install build-essential

what so u mean by that ... i have all ready installed the qc-usb-source package with the Synaptic PM and in the discription it sayed "The qc-usb-source package is a skeleton for creating a kernel module
Sorry, I thought you might not know where to find the package. I'm not sure what to do with it.  Is there a README among the files that it installs?
